name: @substrate/node-watcher
author: Parity Technologies <admin@parity.io>
description: Extract, Transform, Load Kusama/Polkadot history into a PostgreSQL DB

scripts.docker: cp ../../yarn.lock . && docker build -t nomidot_watcher:comment-out-v1.2.27 . && docker tag nomidot_watcher:comment-out-v1.2.27 eu.gcr.io/test-installations-222013/nomidot_watcher:comment-out-v1.2.27 && docker push eu.gcr.io/test-installations-222013/nomidot_watcher:comment-out-v1.2.27 && rm yarn.lock
